name: video-stitcher
description: Reco Video Stitcher Application based on Electron, FastAPI, React, Vite and Three.js

scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../electron && npm install && cd ../backend && npm run backend-install
scripts.backend-build: cross-env SHELL=1 cd backend && pyinstaller --onefile app/main.py --name fastapi_backend --distpath ../electron/resources
scripts.electron-package: npm run download-ffmpeg && npm run frontend-build && electron-forge package
scripts.electron-make: npm run download-ffmpeg && npm run frontend-build && electron-forge make
scripts.build: npm run backend-build && npm run frontend-build && npm run electron-package
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.format: npm run format:js && npm run format:py && npm run format:other
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:js && npm run format:check:py && npm run format:check:other
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules frontend/node_modules electron/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/dist electron/resources && npx rimraf package-lock.json frontend/package-lock.json electron/package-lock.json && npx rimraf backend/venv
